00001 #include "mt/network/TCPSocket.h"

00003 namespace mt {

00005 TCPSocket::TCPSocket() {
00006 
00007         MT_LOGINIT(TCPSocket);
00008 
00009         int isopt = 1;
00010         sd = socket(PF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00011         if (sd <= 0) {
00012                 MT_LOGERROR("can't create socket");
00013                 throw TcpSocketException("can't create socket");
00014         }
00015         fcntl(sd, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
00016         setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &isopt, sizeof(isopt));
00017         state = CLOSED;
00018 
00019 }
00020 
00021 TCPSocket::TCPSocket(int s, struct sockaddr_in rmt) {
00022         MT_LOGINIT(TCPSocket);
00023 
00024         sd = s;
00025         state = ACTIVE;
00026         remote = rmt;
00027 }
00028 
00029 TCPSocket* TCPSocket::Accept() throw (TcpSocketException) {
00030         state = ACTIVE;
00031 
00032         socklen_t len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00033         int retS = ::accept(sd, (sockaddr*) &remote, &len);
00034         if (retS < 0) {
00035                 m_logger->error("accept error: %s", strerror(errno));
00036                 throw(TcpSocketException("accept return error"));
00037         }
00038         m_logger->trace("accept new connection");
00039         TCPSocket *retTCPSocket = (TCPSocket*) new TCPSocket(retS, remote);
00040         return retTCPSocket;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void TCPSocket::Connect(char* addr, int port) throw (TcpSocketException) {
00044 
00045         struct sockaddr_in servAddr;
00046         servAddr = CreateSockAddr_In(addr, port);
00047         if (::connect(sd, (struct sockaddr*) &servAddr, sizeof(servAddr)) != 0) {
00048                 m_logger->error("can't connect to addr: %s port %u with error: %s", addr,
00049                                 port, strerror(errno));
00050                 throw TcpSocketException("can't connect to socket");
00051 
00052         }
00053         state = ACTIVE;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void TCPSocket::Listen(char* addr, int port) throw (TcpSocketException) {
00057 
00058         Bind(addr, port);
00059         Listen();
00060 
00061 }
00062 
00063 void TCPSocket::Listen() throw (TcpSocketException) {
00064 
00065         if (listen(sd, SOMAXCONN) != 0) {
00066                 MT_LOGERROR("can't listen socket: " << strerror(errno));
00067                 throw TcpSocketException("can't listen socket");
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 void TCPSocket::Bind(char* addr, int port) throw (TcpSocketException) {
00072 
00073         struct sockaddr_in myAddr;
00074         myAddr = CreateSockAddr_In(addr, port);
00075         if (bind(sd, (const sockaddr*) &myAddr, sizeof(myAddr)) != 0) {
00076                 m_logger->error("can't bind to : %s, port %u, with error: (%s)", addr,
00077                                 port, strerror(errno));
00078                 throw TcpSocketException("can't bind");
00079         }
00080 
00081 }

00083 int TCPSocket::Recv(char* buf, unsigned int bufLen) {
00084 
00085         int ret = -1;
00086 
00087         if (GetState() == ACTIVE) {
00088                 ret = recv(sd, buf, bufLen, 0);
00089                 if (ret < 0) {
00090                         m_logger->error("recv return error: %s", strerror(errno));
00091                 } else if (ret == 0) {
00092                         m_logger->warn("recv return fin_ack");
00093                         SetState(FIN_WAIT);
00094                         ret = -1;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         return ret;
00098 }
00099 
00100 int TCPSocket::Send(char* buf, unsigned int len) {
00101 
00102         int ret = -1;
00103 
00104         if (GetState() == ACTIVE) {
00105                 ret = send(sd, buf, len, 0);
00106         }
00107         return ret;
00108 }

00113 int TCPSocket::SendTo(char* addr, int port, char* buf, unsigned int len)
00114                 throw (std::exception) {
00115 
00116         int isopt = 1;
00117 
00118         sd = socket(PF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00119         if (sd < 0) {
00120                 MT_LOGERROR("can't create socket");
00121                 throw TcpSocketException("can't create socket");
00122         }
00123         fcntl(sd, F_SETFD, FD_CLOEXEC);
00124         setsockopt(sd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, &isopt, sizeof(isopt));
00125 
00126         Connect(addr, port);
00127 
00128         return Send(buf, len);
00129 
00130 }
